data.title: Which Cable Modem is Better?
data.meta_description:
Out of the following:

Terayon Terapro cable modem  
Terayon TCM200 cable modem  
LANCity cable modem 

Thanx

Akaz
data.meta_site_name: AnandTech Forums: Technology, Hardware, Software, and Deals
data.text:
I've got a Motorola SB3100... and love it. Never had a problem with it and its been almost a year now. Know that doesn't answer your question, but I just thought I'd put my two cents in.

lancity is a dead standard... any cable co using them will switch to docsis pretty soon.....but yes it does have it benefits

i myself prefer the motorola SB3100, one thing... stay away from Com21 modems... they plain old suck ass..

The best cable modem is one you rent. Several dollars a month is cheaper than spending hundreds of dollars for technology than is changing. CompUSA, for example-you can get them cheaper, wants over $200 for a modem. Two hundred dollars divided by the rent, $4.00 a month, you would have to keep the modem over 4 years to break even. I don't thnk the sandards wil be te same in 4 years, do you???? R.

I have that 3com modem that looks like a fish.

would I experience a real difference if I changed modems?

it seems to work fine for me.
